old:
シッ――
あまり大きな声を出すな
column2: Shhhh—Don't speak too loudly.
speaker: Mephis

old: 誰かにつけられてはいないだろうな？
column2: You're not being followed by anyone, are you?
speaker: Mephis

old:
よぉ相棒
わざわざ足を運んでもらって、悪いな
column2: Hey, partner. Sorry for making you come all this way.
speaker: Mephis

old:
クルト家の今後は
まだどうなるか分からないんだ
<NPC 681>は家族をもうけなかったようでな
column2: I'm not yet sure what the future holds for the Kurt family. <NPC 681> didn't seem to have a family of their own.
speaker: Mephis

old:
だが、次の当主がどんな人間でも
俺は支えていくつもりだ
それが――俺なりの、恩返しだと思ってさ
column2: But I'm going to support the next head of the family, no matter who he is. That's how I'm going to repay him.
speaker: Mephis

old: 手短にな
column2: To make it brief.
speaker: Mephis

old:
メガドは、アッカー王家が直々に治める街だが
実質的に政治を動かしているのは
クルト侯爵家なんだ
column2: Megado is a city ruled directly by the Acre Royal Family, but in practice, the one wielding political power is the Marquis Family, Kurt.
speaker: Mephis

old:
メガドの夜は、昼とは異なり
渾沌とした一面を持っている
――<NPC 681>が爵位を継いでから
行った政策のせいだ
column2:
The night in Megado is different from the day and has a chaotic aspect
-- due to the policies that<NPC 681>has implemented since he took over the knighthood.
speaker: Mephis

old:
メガドにいる間は、昼間だからといって
油断しない方がいい
column2: While you're in Megado, don't let your guard down just because it's daytime.
speaker: Mephis

old:
どこに<NPC 681>の手先が
潜んでいるか分からないからな
column2: You never know where<NPC 681>'s minions might be lurking.
speaker: Mephis

old: さっさと済ませるぞ
column2: Let's finish it quickly.
speaker: Mephis

old: やっと片付いたか
column2: Finally finished.
speaker: Mephis

old: 無駄な戦闘は、できるだけ避けたいんだがな
column2: I want to avoid unnecessary battles as much as possible.
speaker: Mephis

old: 騒ぎになると面倒だな
column2: It's troublesome when it becomes a commotion.
speaker: Mephis

old: チッ、雑魚どもめ
column2: Tch, you useless trash!
speaker: Mephis

old: 油断するな、迅速に片付けよう
column2: Don't let your guard down, let's clean up quickly.
speaker: Mephis

old: 仲間を呼ばれる前に、確実に息の根を止めよう
column2: Take them out before they call their friends.
speaker: Mephis

old: さすがは覚者サマ、といったところだな
column2: Indeed, as expected of an Arisen.
speaker: Mephis

old: まずいな、オークを片付けるぞ！
column2: First of all, we need to take care of the Orcs!
speaker: Mephis

old: 急ぐぞ、嫌な予感がする――
column2: Let's hurry, I have a bad feeling—
speaker: Mephis

old: さぁ、今日もやるか
column2: Now, shall we do it today as well?
speaker: Mephis
